meta.title: MatDash - Business Dashboard
meta.description: Professional business dashboard for comprehensive data management and analytics
meta.keywords: business dashboard, analytics, data management, business intelligence

login.title: Login - MatDash
login.description: Access your MatDash account to manage your projects and access the dashboard.

signup.title: Sign Up - MatDash
signup.description: Create a new MatDash account to start managing your projects and access all features.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password - MatDash
forgot_password.description: Reset your MatDash account password by entering your email address.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
login.invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please make sure you have already registered an account and try again.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle: Enter your details to create a new account

validation.name_min_length: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters

errors.network_error: Connection error. Check your internet connection.

success.account_created: Account created! Please check your email to verify your account.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address

messages.reset_sent: Reset link sent! Check your email.
messages.reset_failed: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
messages.user_not_found: No account found with this email.

success.title: Email Sent
success.description: We've sent password reset instructions to your email address.
success.check_spam: Don't see the email? Check your spam folder.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please make sure you have already registered an account and try again.
errors.accountExists: An account with this email already exists.
errors.accountNotFound: No account found with this email address.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.passwordResetFailed: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
errors.passwordResetExpired: Password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address before signing in.
errors.accountLocked: Your account has been temporarily locked. Please contact support.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.

success.accountCreated: Account created successfully! Please check your email to verify your account.
success.loginSuccess: Welcome back! You have been signed in successfully.
success.logoutSuccess: You have been signed out successfully.
success.passwordResetSent: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email.
success.passwordChanged: Your password has been changed successfully.
success.emailVerified: Your email has been verified successfully.
success.profileUpdated: Your profile has been updated successfully.
